title: College Entry Timing
content: Students must enter the college campus before 10:30 AM on working days.

title: ID Card Requirement
content: All students must carry their college ID card while on campus.

title: Mobile Phone Usage
content: Mobile phones are not allowed inside classrooms without faculty permission.

title: Library Discipline
content: Students must maintain silence inside the library at all times.

title: Dress Code
content: Students must follow the appropriate college dress code while attending classes.

title: Attendance Requirement
content: A minimum of 75 percent attendance is required to appear in examinations.

title: Exam Conduct
content: Students must not use unfair means during examinations.

title: Campus Cleanliness
content: Students must keep the campus clean and use dustbins properly.

title: Late Submission Policy
content: Late submission of assignments is allowed only with valid reasons and faculty approval.

title: Lab Safety
content: Students must follow all safety instructions while working in laboratories.

title: Office Working Hours
content: The college office is open from 10:30 AM to 5 PM on working days.

title: Library Membership
content: Library membership is automatically provided to all enrolled students.

title: Scholarship Information
content: Students can apply for scholarships through the Government scholarship portal.

title: Lost ID Card
content: In case of a lost ID card, students must apply for a duplicate at the Student Section.

title: Bonafide Certificate
content: Bonafide certificates can be requested from the Student Section and are issued within two working days.

title: Faculty Appointment Booking
content: Students must book faculty appointments at least one day in advance through the portal.

title: Faculty Meeting Timings
content: Faculty meetings are generally conducted between 10 AM and 4 PM on working days.

title: Emergency Appointments
content: Emergency appointments may be allowed only with prior permission from the faculty.

title: Faculty Leave Policy
content: If a faculty member is on leave, appointments must be rescheduled after their return.
